title: Giant's Kitchen Adventure #74
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: High Pantry Shelf
rooms.description: You stand on a wooden shelf towering high above the kitchen floor. Enormous jars of flour and sugar loom like buildings around you. The air smells of dried herbs and spices. Far below, you can see the giant's kitchen counter. A rope made of twine hangs down from a hook, offering a way to descend.

items.name: massive flour jar
items.description: A glass jar the size of a house, filled with white flour

items.name: small brass key
items.description: A tiny key that must have fallen into the flour jar long ago

items.name: giant spice rack
items.description: A wooden rack holding enormous spice containers with different compartments

items.name: giant's recipe card
items.description: A stained card with a cookie recipe written in large letters
items.text: GIANT'S FAVORITE COOKIES: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix 2 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, 3 eggs. Bake for 15 minutes. Note: I always bake these on Tuesdays for my friend Greta who lives in the Mountain Cave.

items.name: tarnished silver key
items.description: A small silver key hidden among the peppercorns

items.name: locked cookie tin
items.description: A decorative tin with a brass lock, likely containing treats

items.name: giant's shopping list
items.description: A crumpled piece of paper with a shopping list
items.text: SHOPPING LIST: Eggs, milk, bread, cheese. Remember to visit the Market Square on Saturday. Don't forget Greta's birthday gift!

items.name: twine rope
items.description: A sturdy rope hanging down to the kitchen counter below

rooms.name: Giant's Kitchen Counter
rooms.description: An enormous kitchen counter stretches out like a vast plaza. A huge cutting board serves as a platform, and kitchen utensils tower overhead like metal trees. A massive cookbook lies open, and a refrigerator hums in the distance. To the east, you can see a window cracked open, letting in fresh air and sunlight.

items.name: giant cookbook
items.description: An enormous cookbook opened to a well-worn page
items.text: CHAPTER 7: GIANT CUISINE. My name is Grog the Giant, and I've lived in this kitchen for 50 years. My favorite meal is roasted vegetables with herbs from my garden. I always cook dinner at 6 PM sharp.

items.name: wooden cutting board
items.description: A massive cutting board with knife marks and food stains

items.name: daily schedule note
items.description: A note pinned under a knife, detailing the giant's routine
items.text: DAILY SCHEDULE: 6 AM - Wake up and tend the garden. 12 PM - Lunch. 6 PM - Dinner preparation. 9 PM - Read by the fireplace. Tuesdays - Bake cookies. Saturdays - Market Square shopping.

items.name: utensil holder
items.description: A ceramic container holding enormous spoons, forks, and knives

items.name: copper key
items.description: A small copper key wedged between the utensils

items.name: giant breadbox
items.description: A large wooden box with a silver lock, used for storing bread

items.name: letter to Greta
items.description: An unsealed letter addressed to someone named Greta
items.text: Dear Greta, I hope this letter finds you well in the Mountain Cave. Thank you for being such a wonderful friend. I'm planning to visit Market Square this Saturday to find you a special birthday present. Your friend always, Grog

items.name: sugar bowl with lid
items.description: A covered bowl containing sugar, with a copper lock on the lid

items.name: escape instructions
items.description: A small note written in tiny handwriting, clearly left by another small person
items.text: TO WHOEVER FINDS THIS: The window is your escape route! But the giant has installed a security latch. To unlock it, you must answer three questions about him. Study everything carefully. Good luck! - Previous Escapee

items.name: window security latch
items.description: A complex locking mechanism on the window, designed to keep small creatures from escaping. A small panel displays three security questions.

password_questions.question: What is the giant's name?
password_questions.hint: Check the cookbook for the giant's introduction

password_questions.question: Where does Greta live?
password_questions.hint: The recipe card and letter both mention Greta's home

password_questions.question: Where does the giant shop?
password_questions.hint: Look at the shopping list and schedule note

rooms.name: Garden Outside the Window
rooms.description: You've made it outside! Fresh air fills your lungs as you stand on the windowsill overlooking a beautiful garden. Birds chirp in the distance, and a gentle breeze carries the scent of flowers. A vine grows down the side of the house, offering a safe path to the ground and freedom.

items.name: climbing vine
items.description: A thick vine covered in morning glories, leading safely down to the garden below

items.name: garden vista
items.description: A beautiful view of the giant's well-tended vegetable garden, with rows of enormous carrots, tomatoes, and herbs

rooms.win_message: You've successfully escaped the Giant's Kitchen! As you climb down the vine to freedom, you look back at the enormous house one last time. The giant Grog will never know how close he came to discovering you. You're free, you're safe, and you have quite the tale to tell. You win!
